definition: Linzhou county level city in Anyang 安陽|安阳[An1 yang2], Henan
surname Lin/Japanese surname Hayashi
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Linzhou county level city in Anyang 安陽|安阳[An1 yang2], Henan

sentences.english: Today, Han Jia and I will bring you to Linzhou to take a look at the Grand Taihang Canyon.
sentences.chinese: 今天我和韩佳就要带你去林州的太行大峡谷看一看。

sentences.english: Only such a monument can match the spirit of the Red Flag Canal displayed by Linzhou people.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样的碑才配得上林州人创造的红旗渠精神。

sentences.english: It's a canal dug by the people of Linzhou. It's called the Red Flag Canal.
sentences.chinese: 水长城说的就是林州人修建的水渠，叫红旗渠。

sentences.english: How did the Linzhou people manage to divert the Zhanghe water up to the Red Flag Canal?
sentences.chinese: 林州人是怎样把漳河的水引到红旗渠里的呀？

sentences.english: Han Jia, why did the local people in Linzhou want to build the canal?
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，林州人为什么要修建红旗渠啊？

sentences.english: Whose heart Is Chilling While Lin states stop heating ?
sentences.chinese: 林州停止供暖寒了谁的心？

sentences.english: Linzhou City of Anyang lies right at the foot of the Taihang Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 安阳的林州市就坐落太行山脚下。

sentences.english: The people of Linzhou displayed a fearless spirit.
sentences.chinese: 林州人真有一股大无畏的气概。

sentences.english: Photo shows the scenery of Taihang Grand Canyon in Linzhou city, central China's Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 太行大峡谷位于河南省林州市，长达50公里。
